instructions: Swipe down from the middle of the Home screen. Tap the search field, then enter what you re looking for. Do any of the following: Hide the keyboard and see more results on the screen: Tap Search. Open a suggested app: Tap it. Get more information about a search suggestion: Tap it, then tap one of the results to open it. Start a new search: Tap the Clear Text button in the search field.
Go to Settings > Siri & Search. Scroll down, tap an app, then turn Show in Search on or off.
Go to Settings > Privacy > Location Services. Tap System Services, then turn off Location-Based Suggestions.
In an app, tap the search field or button the Search button (if there is one). If you don t see a search field or button, swipe down from the top. Type your search, then tap Search.
From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System Settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi network you want to delete. Tap Forget .

Drag down the Quick Settings menu from the top of the screen. Tap the Wi-Fi Calling icon to turn it on. The icon turns blue and the Wi-Fi settings menu appears. Tap the desired Wi-Fi network. If prompted, enter the password. Tap Connect .

Drag down the Quick Settings menu from the top of the screen. Tap the Wi-Fi Calling icon to turn it on or off. On: The icon turns blue and the Wi-Fi settings menu appears. Off: The icon turns gray and the Wi-Fi settings menu disappears.
